overview: This is about hope, decay, vanity, denial and anxiety. It's about grey men and pompous cloaks, dead fish and exit signs, broken clocks and lying scales. "Our King is Home" is an experimental short film, which gives you insight into the transcendental world of self-awareness with stunning pictures and forceful sound.
tagline: Hope, decay, vanity, denial and anxiety. Grey men and pompous cloaks, dead fish and exit signs, broken clocks and lying scales.
title: Our King is Home
